headline: Hong Kong Denies Entry, Activist Says
abstract: Kenneth Roth, executive director of the organization, said immigration officials turned him away at the airport in what some saw as the latest sign of deteriorating freedoms in the city.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — The head of an international human rights group who had planned to criticize China’s growing global influence at an event in Hong Kong said he was barred from entry on Sunday in the latest sign of eroding freedoms in the city.
keywords: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
